name: Ari's Delivery Palooza
overview: In a calm, small city, there's a young human called Ari who moved there recently, and works with delivery. Which is a fairly easy job -- you receive your order, meet with your client, and then you deliver the package. Or so it should be-- Embark with Ari in this hectic day for delivery services, in a game full of (bad) puns, cute art and an overall feeling of wholesomeness in a game of around 1 hour of gameplay! If you download the file, play it with your favorite gb emulator!
